about_the_game:
Corrupted is a first-person horror game set in an eerie mansion where players delve into a suspenseful journey through a haunted past, engaging in a blend of psychological and survival horror that keeps them on the edge of their seats. The game features exploration, puzzle-solving, resource management, and combat, offering an immersive and truly terrifying experience.


Navigate through the ever-evolving world of Corrupted, where strategic backtracking is crucial for achieving objectives, solving puzzles, unlocking optional areas, and engaging in battles with enemies. Immerse yourself in the intricately designed environment, uncovering hidden secrets and encountering evolving challenges that intricately weave into the unfolding narrative.



Confront adversaries with heightened senses in Corrupted, immersing yourself in an atmosphere laden with unpredictable and unique challenges that await. Navigate through the unknown, where each decision becomes a pivotal choice between facing these formidable foes head-on or adopting strategic evasion tactics. You have the freedom to shape your own journey, playing in a way that suits your style and heightens the suspenseful narrative.



Corrupted harnesses the advanced capabilities of Unreal Engine 5, incorporating cutting-edge features like Metahuman and Lumen. The game boasts realistic environments, lifelike character models, dynamic lighting, and fluid animation, collectively delivering an unparalleled horror experience that sets a new standard in 2024.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM / AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8700 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 12
